Offer.OfferDescription: (Plant Patent # 29273, Var: FRYrapture) Flawless, non-fading, dark pink blooms are classically formed on long stems. Plants put out a profusion of blossoms throughout the season that will guarantee arm loads of luminous, subtly spicy cut flowers to gift to your loved ones or keep for yourself. Good disease resistance and excellent vigor add to the value of this beloved specimen. Hybridizer: Fryer, 2017 <br><b>Bare Root Budded</b>
